episodes.title: David Hundeyin on growing up in a cult, exposing a President, & the war on African Journalism...
episodes.description:
I sat down for an in-depth conversation with investigative journalist, author, and filmmaker David @hundeyin .
David speaks candidly about his childhood and growing up as a Jehovah witness, what molded him, and the incredible stories that catapulted him to become a transformative, generational voice in Nigeria and Africa.

(We apologize for the sound issues in the first 20 minutes of this episode. We faced a multitude of technical difficulties)


_________________
I am Laura, a strategic communications advisor to international organizations like the United Nations.
I help Foundations, NGOs & purpose-driven organizations increase their media coverage by 300%, to lead to greater donations.
This channel serves as a playground to explore the ins and outs of how media is utilized in today's world. Interested in working together? Visit the-map.fr

_________________
CREDITS:
Footage from @RootsTVNigeria @AriseNewsChannel @NewsCentralAfrica  
Most edits made with DaVinci Resolve (https://www.blackmagicdesign.com/products/davinciresolve), Cap Cut, and Gling (https://gling.ai/?via=laura).
